name: Vabble
description: Vabble is an SVOD building an interactive, social based UX.. Vabble is building an ecosystem that may support the film industry both from a view of independent film creators or larger production studios. This is done by an ecosystem, an economy by where users pay to consume content and that revenue is delivered directly to the content owners. A P2P economy supported by VAB! Further more, Production launchpad is a means for production studios to secure funding for productions and for investors in invest in films. The production launchpad is controlled by community governance where users must stake to participate. Governance controls what films make it though to launchpad for funding but also what titles are added to Vabbles library. Vabble are onboarding considerable names as advisors to Vabbles film board with John C Hall, Former EVP of Universal Pictures being one of the many.
